1.content:
The school day is almost over. Just 5 more minutes until you can go home and enjoy the weekend. You spend the remainder of your algebra class chatting with your friend Sam. The teacher has learned better than to try and keep you two quiet. It's more trouble than it's worth. With two minutes of class remaining, the teacher announces that she'll be handing back the tests for earlier in the week. You and your friend cease talking at the same time. Both of you know that you did really bad on the tests. But the difference is that a bad grade by Sam's standards is a C-, while a bad grade by your standards is an F. Your paper gets handed back to you and of course, it has "See me after class" written on it. This is probably because on the questions you didn't know, you drew offensive pictures as answers. The bell rings and everyone except you leaves.

After a loooooong speech, the teacher finally let's you off of the hook.

"What time is it?" You ask yourself. You take out your cell phone but the power is out, so you just look at one of the many clocks inside of the school. It's too late, your bus has already left by now. Unfortunately, this means that you will have to walk three miles to get home. Disgruntled, you leave the school and begin to make your way back home. About a third of the way through your walk, the hairs on your neck begin to stand. Something is setting off your woman's intuition. Before you can check to see what it is, a sack is tossed over your head. You let out a scream as you are dragged into what you can only guess is some sort of vehicle.

"Help, help!!!" you plea as a door is shut behind you. You're strapped into some kind of odd seat. It almost feels like a toddler's car seat. You are driven for what feels like forever. You try to struggle but it has no effect, so you just silently sob. After a while, Some one takes you out of the vehicle and places you into something else. It sound's like some sort of helicopter. After a long time, you are taken out of the second vehicle and placed into some kind of room.

Finally being alone, you are able to take off the sack. You find yourself in an all white room with no visible doors.

"Where am I". you shout at the room. A male's voice responds to your cries.

"Don't worry, this room is only temporary, and Kim, we will be seeing you real soon.". The voice stops and never talks again. No matter how many times you scream, you don't get another reply. You can only cry.

After what seems like 10 hours, you begin to become hungry and have to go pee really badly. You cross your legs in an attempt to keep from pissing yourself. About another hour later you are almost beyond the breaking point.

"Why did this have too happen to me?" You whine. "I don't want to be hear. I don't want to stay in this room. And I definitely don't want to have an accident.".

15 more minutes pass until you finally lose control of your bladder. The pee starts to dribble but quickly begins to gush out. The pee soaks your panties and it quickly overflows and gets your skirt wet.

You start bawling again. Being trapped here is one thing, but wetting yourself is far worse. You do nothing to try and stop the wetting. Soon you are sitting inside of a pool of piss. You cry for a little bit longer and eventually lie down. You're too sad to stay awake any longer. You doze off while still wearing your soaked garments.

When you awaken...

A high school senior, like yourself, being babied, suckling on a pacifier, and even more peculiar, is this whole PLACE. As your mother pushes you through the mall, you look around you, and see practically EVERYONE pushing a stroller as well. WHAT IN THE WORLD IS GOING ON, HERE!

You let yourself drop to the floor and sit silently. You look around the room and notice a strange slip off paper. You walk over to it and read it aloud.

"Welcome to our nursery Kimberly. As we have guessed, you probably do not like it here but don't worry, there are plenty of things you can do. You could take a nap on one of the cribs, play with the toys, or even have a nice drink of delicious formula. And don't worry If you have an accident in your diapey. The staff should be with you within a couple of hours or the next day or so. Have fun.
-CIA/FBI

You stomp on the ground angrily.

"This sucks. Why would anyone ever place a beauty like me into a smelly old nursery. The staff better know what's going on.".

You eventually decide to explore your new surroundings. As you walk deeper into the room, you realize that there are no doors and that you're trapped.

"What am I suppose to do now that I'm stuck here.". You whine.

You begin to think of what the note said. That you could play with toys, sleep in a crib, and drink a baby formula. While none of those things sounded very luxurious, it would be boring spending a couple hours or even a day alone in a nursery.

What will you do?

You hung up right then and their. You had no idea who that was, but he certainly wasn't your parents. And that remark about losing dessert seemed to linger in your head... The next logical step was to try and call the cops. You proceeded to dial the number and once again waited. When the other end picked up, it wasn't a person but an answering machine.

"Thank you for calling the police, if you are afraid that there is a boggyman in your closet, press 1. If you are having trouble using the potty, press 2. If you would like a lullaby to help you sleep, press 3.

You didn't know what in the world was happening, you without a doubt called the right number. Out of desperation, you pressed 2.

(The woman cut you off.)

And there's nothing you can do about it." he explains, smirking.

You begin to cry. The man picks you up, and walks out of the room. He takes you to a...
13.title: You are inside some kind of a lab.

131.content:
You are carried into the living room, where you notice a few other men talking. The man who kidnapped you sits in an armchair, and he begins talking to his friends. The man holds you so that your chin is resting on his shoulder. He begins rubbing your back. You start calming down.

"Is the little baby hungry?" he asks.

You are carried into the kitchen. Your captor takes a full bottle out of the fridge. he heats it up, and begins feeding you. You drink the bottle, hungry. When you finish, you are burped. You begin feeling tired again. You are carried back into the living room, and sat down on your captor's lap. He moves you over to his knee, and begins lightly bouncing you. He begins talking to you in baby talk. You start feeling queasy. Before you know it, you spit up all over yourself. You begin sobbing.

"Oh, it's ok." coos your captor. He carries you upstairs, into the bathroom. He begins filling a tub with a little bit of water. He puts you in a baby bath seat. He shuts off the water, and bathes you. once done, he carries you into the nursery, and lays you on the changing table. He puts you in a clean diaper, and a pink onesie. He puts baby booties on your feet, and a pacifier in your mouth. He carries you to the crib, and lays you down.

"Time to go night night." he says. He turns on a mobile, baby monitor, and leaves after turning off the light and shutting the door.
131.title: Living room, where a few other men are talking

1311.content:
You soon fall asleep, exhausted. Sometime in the middle of the night, you begin sobbing. Your 'daddy' walks into your nursery, and walks over to your crib.

"Awww, is my little baby upset?" he asks. "Daddy's gonna make it better." he says, picking you up.

He carries you to the changing table, and lays you down on it. He changes your diaper, which was wet. Once he puts you in a clean diaper, he puts you onesie back on. He carries you to a rocking chair, and sits, holding you in his arms. He begins rocking. You suck on your pacifier for comfort, and start to feel better. You soon fall asleep, due to the rocking. You are put back in your crib. The next morning, you sleep for a really long time. You drowsily open your eyes, only partially though. You feel yourself being picked up. You are carried to the changing table, and changed. You are put into a purple onesie.

"Someone had a good sleep, didn't she?' he says. It is sunny and nice today.
1311.title: Sleep

1312.content: All you can do is cry. You are so upset! Your pacifier falls out of your mouth. You don't want to take a nap! Your bladder feels full, and you have no control over it. You begin to wet your diaper uncontrollably. This makes you cry harder. Eventually, your throat is sore. You can't cry any longer. You finally fall asleep. Your captor walks quietly into your nursery, and walks over to your crib. He puts your pacifier in your mouth. You suck on it in your sleep. He kisses your forehead. You stir a bit, but stay asleep.
1312.title: Cry

13121.content:
You wake up a long time later. You feel the sudden need to go to the bathroom, but then you no longer have to. You feel the pee running into your diaper. Before you are done relieving yourself, you begin crying. Your 'daddy' walks into the room.

"Oh, does my little baby need to be changed?" he asks. He picks you up, and kisses you on the head. He carries you over to your changing table, and changes you. He kisses your forehead again, and carries you downstairs. There is a knock on the door.

"Right on time." he says out loud. He opens the door. You see one of your closest friends from school! You were sure she didn't recognize you. What was she doing here? You began motioning with your hands for her to run, that she would be regressed as you had! When she walks in, you begin whimpering. It's too late!

"Hello, Mr. Matthews." Jayden says.

"Hello, Jayden. Thanks for getting here so quickly. I really need to get going in a few minutes." your 'daddy' says.

"Oh, no problem. I love babysitting." Jayden replies. Babysitting? Jayden was babysitting you!

"This is Kimmy. She's four months old." he says.

"Oh, she's adorable." Jayden says.

"Thanks. ok, so, she usually eats at 6:15, and then I either put her in her playpen or swing. She loves her pacifier, and her blanket. She goes to bed at 8:30. She's been very cranky lately, crying when I put her in her crib. The emergency numbers are on the fridge. And all her stuff is in bins in her nursery." he says. You begin crying.

"Ooohh, someone wants her pacifier." your 'daddy' says. He pulls one of your pacifiers out of his pocket, and puts it in your mouth. You suck on it, a few tears rolling down your cheeks. 'Daddy' kisses you on the head. "Be a good baby for daddy. I love you, sweet-pea." He pulls his coat on, and takes out his wallet. He pays Jayden in advance, and leaves. You look at Jayden with pleading eyes.

"Awww, you're so adorable." she says. She carries you into the living room, and sits on the couch, you in her lap. You kick your legs a bit, then stop.

"What's wrong, baby?" she asks softly. You are turned so that you can face her. You look into her ice blue eyes. She doesn't understand you. You just keep sucking on your pacifier. It's been very comforting through all of this.

"Do you want your blankie?" Jayden asks. She carries you up to your nursery, and wraps you in your light pink baby blanket. You snuggle into it. You are getting hungry. Jayden checks her watch.

"Are you getting hungry, Kimmy?" she asks. She walks to the kitchen, and makes you a bottle. She feeds and burps you, while humming. You are given your pacifier, and you suck on it. Jayden walks into the living room, and puts you in your playpen. You suck on your pacifier, and play with your toes. You don't really care about anything else right now. Time passes quickly, and you are soon carried into your nursery. Jayden changes you, and carries you to your crib.

"Ok, Kimmy, time for bed." she says softly. She carefully lowers you into your crib. She puts your baby blanket over you. she turns on your baby monitor and mobile, and turns off the light, leaving. You fall into a peaceful sleep.
13121.title: Wake up later

131211.content: You feel yourself being lifted. You open your eyes, and you see that it is light outside. You look up, and see that you are in your 'daddy's' arms. He looks down, and smiles. Good morning, sweetheart." he says softly. He carries you over to the changing table, and lays you down. He changes you, and carries you downstairs. He takes out a baby bottle, fills it with formula, and heats it up. He tests the temperature to make sure it is ok, and he feeds you. After you are fed, he puts you in your swing, and buckles you in. He puts your blanket over you, and walks into the computer room.
131211.title: Wake in your 'daddy's arms

choices: Wake up a few hours later
1312112.content: You begin crying, not wanting to be alone. Your 'daddy' walks over to you, a concerned look on his face. "What's wrong, sweetie?" he asked. He picks you up, and rocks you. You begin to calm down, and are put in your playpen. You begin to fall back asleep, exhausted.
1312112.title: You begin to cry

13121121.content: You wake up feeling gross. You open you eyes, and the first thing you see when you look down are your breasts. But weren't you a baby? You move your arms, and they are normal. You are a teenager again, and you are in a crib. Your cheerfulness deflates like a balloon. You feel a pacifier in your mouth, and you are about to spit it out, when you hear the familiar voice. "Don't you dare spit that out, little girl." he says. Startled, you look up and see the man that kidnapped you. You begin to cry, and feel pee rushing into the already used diaper. You are picked up and carried to a changing table, all the while being cooed at in a soothing voice. "Shush, Daddy's sorry, baby girl. He din't mean to scare you. It's ok, let's get you changed." he says, beginning to change you. You squirm, highly uncomfortable. He calmly just holds your legs, cleaning you. After that, he sprinkles baby powder on your crotch, and pulls the front of the diaper up. But before he tapes it like you think he is going to, he rolls you onto your stomach. Surprised, you let out a tiny bit more urine. You feel a cold paste on your butt, and cry as it is rubbed on. You continue crying as you are rolled back onto your back. The man sees the small yellow spot, and puts a bit more baby powder on you. The smell is strong, and you kick your legs. The diaper is taped up, and you stop kicking. "Ok, baby, let's go get you a bottle." he says, as he picks you up and carries you to the kitchen. The pacifier is not in your mouth, but it is attached by a clip to your onesie. "I want to go home." you say. "You are home." he tells you, grabbing a bottle from the fridge. He heats it up, and holds it up for you. You refuse to drink at first, but you are thirsty, so you give in. You drink the bottle quickly, wanting to get it over with. "Baby, slow down, Daddy doesn't want you to get a tummy ache." he tells you. You roll your eyes.
13121121.title: Wake up a few hours later

131211211.content:
He burps you, and you blush. "Ok baby, it's time for a nap." he says, carrying you backing the teenage sized nursery. He lays you in your crib, and pulls a soft blanket up to your shoulders. "I'm not tired." you tell him. He takes the pacifier and sticks it in your mouth. "No no, none of that." he says. You make grumbling sound around the pacifier. "Shh shh shh." he says, gently stroking your forehead with his thumb. You go silent, and suck on the pacifier. "Good girl. Night night baby, see you later." he says, turning on a baby monitor. He goes to the door, shuts off the light, and leaves. You kick the blanket off of you, and stand up. You carefully climb over the side, and lower yourself to the ground. You go to the closet, and as you are about to open it, you hear footsteps. Panicked, you run to the crib, and jumped in over the edge. You quickly lay down, and pull up the blanket, just as the man walks in. "Baby girl, what was all that noise?" he asks, walking over to the crib, looking down at you. You begin closing your eyes, hoping to look tired. You suck on the pacifier, hoping you look innocent. "Ok, let's turn on your mobile." he says, switching the thing on. He leaves again, and you are relieved. You turn off the baby monitor this time, and climb out. You sneak to the door, and open it silently. You sneak out of the nursery, and down the hall. You see what you assume to be the back door, and walk over to it. As you are about to reach it, you are picked up from behind, and a needle is plunged into your arm. Everything goes black, and you fall into a sea of unconsciousness.
You awaken a while later, and you cannot move. You scream, and a minute later, your captor is in the nursery, standing over your cribs, arms crossed over his chest. "When you show me that you cannot be trusted to be able to move, you lose your ability to move." he says sternly. You scream again, and begin to cry. He softens, and gently picks you up, holding you with his hand supporting the back of your head. If you could move, now would be the perfect time. "There there little one. The effects will wear off in about a week. Daddy just needs you to learn your new role, and calm down." he soothes. Even though you cannot move your limbs, you feel a shiver run down your spine. "There there." he says again. He holds you close, shushing you softly.
131211211.title: "Time for a nap."

choices: Daddy comes in and you apologize
You stop crying; he can't have the upper hand
1312112112.content: You make as much noise as you can, and spit out the pacifier. "I want down." you say. "Ok." he says, putting you in the crib. You try to move, but it is utterly useless. "What did Daddy say? Baby can't move, even if she wanted to. Does someone need her diaper changed?" he tells you. "No!" you yell. He puts a clean pacifier in your mouth, and clips it to your onesie. You try to say something, but you are shushed. "Ah ah ah, fussy babies don't get to talk." he replied. You pout, and he tickles your chin. "Let's check that diaper just in case." he adds, picking you up. You let the pacifier fall from your mouth, and he lays you down on the changing table. "I hate you." you say. He looks genuinely hurt. He puts the pacifier back in your mouth, and carries you back to your crib, laying you down. He turns on the mobile, and leaves. As he shuts the door, you hear him cry. This makes you feel bad, and you cry as well.
1312112112.title: Continue fussing

choices: Wake up with feeling in your arms and legs
13121121121.content: He walks back into the nursery, eyes tinted pink. You spit out the pacifier. "Daaaddy..." you whine, and he walks over to you. "Yes princess?" he asks. "I sowwy. Don't cwy." you tell him. 'Where did that come from? Why am I acting like this?' you think. He picks you up, and puts your pacifier back in your mouth. "Daddy loves you very much." he says, kissing your forehead. "Now that baby is less cranky, let's get you a baba." he coos, carrying you into the kitchen. He pulls a baby bottle out of the fridge and warms it up for you. He removes your pacifier, eliciting a whine. "Shh, I need to feed you so your tummy isn't empty." he tells you, putting the bottle in your mouth. You drink the warm milk, or at least what you assume is milk. It turns out that it actually a special formula made for teen and adult babies, containing protein, some vitamins, and some minerals. It doesn't taste bad, but there is a hint of chalkiness. You move your head back to remove the bottle from your mouth, and clamp your mouth shut. "Come on baby girl, open up for Daddy." he encourages. You shake your head. "Come on, you can't be full already." he says. You still refuse the bottle. "Do you want applesauce?" he asks you. You nod, and he goes to the fridge. He puts the bottle back, and switches it out for applesauce. He puts it in a baby bowl, and warms it up, sprinkling a tiny bit of cinnamon on it. He walks over to the high chair and puts you in. He dips the spoon into the food, and brings it up to your mouth. You eat, happy. "Aww, there's a good baby. Daddy is very proud." he coos. You smile and giggle. After you finish your food, he picks you back up. He puts the bowl and spoon in the sink, and you put your head on his shoulder. You don't even notice that he goes to the fridge and takes something out. He carries you back to your nursery, and sits in the rocking chair with you in his lap. He pulls the bottle out from behind his back, and brings it to your lips. You begin to cry, not knowing how else to deal with your emotions. "Babydoll, it won't hurt you. It's just formula. You're eventually going to need the protein." he says. You shake your head, and snuggle into his chest. "Are you full? Do you have a tummy ache?" he asks with concern. You don't respond. "Ok. Daddy wants you to drink the baba eventually, but for now, it's night night for you. Let's get you in a clean diaper and into some warm jammies." He carries you over to the changing table, and you suck your pacifier. He opens your onesie and diaper, and takes out a baby wipe. The cold air makes you pee a little bit, but that is cleaned up quickly. He replaces the wet diaper, applies rash cream and powder, and closes the diaper. He takes out a fluffy pink sleeper, and puts it on you. "Night night baby. Daddy will see you in the morning." he says as he lays you down, turning on the monitor and mobile. He leaves after grabbing the bottle and shutting off the light.
13121121121.title: Daddy comes in and you apologize

13122.content:
Your 'daddy' carries you to the changing table, and changes you. He puts your onesie back on, and puts you back in your crib. You remain asleep the entire time.
You wake up to your stomach growling. You see that the sun has already set. It is dark out. Have you been asleep for a couple hours? Your 'daddy' walks in, and picks you up. He changes your diaper, which you had messed in your sleep.

"I thought my baby girl would never wake up." he says. You are confused why he said that. As you are carried into the kitchen, he takes a bottle out of the fridge.

"Someone must be hungry after 24 hours." he says. You'd been asleep for a whole day, and you didn't even know it! Your stomach growls noticeably now.

"Awww, my poor baby." he says, as he removes your pacifier. You are about to start crying before you get your bottle. You drink hungrily. When you finish, you are burped. Your pacifier replaces the bottle, and you suck happily.
13122.title: Stay asleep

choices: You wake up in your captor's arms
You wake up in your crib
132.content:
You are carried into the kitchen, and the man walks over to the fridge. He pulls out a remade baby bottle, and heats it up. You try to think of a way out of your predicament. You decided that you will escape when these guys least expect it. The man walks into the living room, where he sits in a armchair. A few of his buddies are sitting on the couch, watching football. They are all wearing jerseys, and eye black.

"Open up." instructs your captor.

You refuse. You don't want to humiliate yourself in front of these men. The man holding you pinches your nose. You try holding your breath for as long as you can, but you can't hold it for over a couple seconds. You open your mouth to breathe, and your captor takes the chance to put the bottle into your mouth. Realizing you have no choice, you begin to drink, crying. You wanted to go home. You didn't want to be a baby, in the hands of these men!

After a while, you miserably finish the bottle. The man burps you, and walks upstairs, carrying you. He walks into the room you woke up in.

"Baby needs to go down for a nap." he says, as he took you to a changing table. Much to your embarrassment, he changes your diaper you'd been wearing. It was wet! You didn't even know you'd wet it. You began to cry again. You hated this more than anything you've hated in your entire life.

"Shh, calm down. it's ok, Kim." he says, putting a pacifier into your mouth. You suck on it. What else can you do? You were picked up by him once again, and carried over to the crib, which you guessed was your crib. You were laid down, and covered with a baby blanket.

"Daddy will put on some music so baby can go night-night." he said, turning on some lullabies. It sent shivers up your spine, hearing him say daddy. This man was not your father, and you sure as heck weren't glad he wasn't! You saw him flick off the light, and shut the door. Now would be the perfect time to escape! But sleep is overcoming your tiny baby's body. You can't fight any longer, and you drift off into a peaceful slumber.
132.title: Kitchen, where he pulls out a baby bottle and f...

choices: You fall, bruise your leg, and sob
1321.content:
You begin to stir. You start whimpering, and kicking your feet. You open your eyes, and look up. You are being held by your 'daddy', the man that turned you into a baby. You begin to cry, but realize that there is a pacifier in your mouth. You try spitting it out, but you want to keep sucking on the comforting object. Your captor stands, and carries you up to the nursery. He lays you down on the changing table, and changes your diaper. You are so mad! You would never be here if only you had made your bus!

"Oh, is the little baby upset?" he coos, putting a pair of pink footies on you. He picks you up, and sets you down in the crib. There are a few baby toys in it. He expects you to play with these? You weren't amused.

He picks up a rattle, and begins to shake it. You get an idea. You take the rattle, and begin shaking it. The man bends down. You lift your arm, and bonk him on the head with the rattle. You imagine it didn't hurt that much, but it seemed to do something. You begin laughing. He looks at you sternly.

"That was bad. If you do that again, you will be spanked." he says. You look at him with a look of enmity. He leaves the room, after turning on a mobile, baby monitor, and turning off the light. You sit in the crib, thinking what to do. You look at the floor. The crib appears to be three feet off the ground, but if you were to scale the bars, it would be an seven foot drop! You couldn't do that, you were only a baby! You decided you would need to do something less risky if you wanted to get out of here. You look around in the crib, and see a baby blanket. You think about using it as a cushion at the bottom, along with a few of the stuffed animals. Yes, that would work, right? You hoped so.

You begin to toss items out of the crib, onto the floor. You begin to scale the bars of the crib. You are hanging on the outside, on your tiptoes, arms hanging above your head. You are about to drop, when...
1321.title: You wake up in your captor's arms

13211.content:
You lose your grip, and fall. You land mostly on your makeshift cushion, but your right leg hits the ground. You begin to sob. A couple of your captors open the door, and see you. They walk in, and one picks you up.

"Tsk, tsk, tsk. Seems like the little baby was naughty and got out of her crib. And now your little leg got hurt, right?" he said condescendingly. His friend smirks. You continue crying. Your leg hurts! The man holding you walks over to a mirror, and you see the bruise on your leg. It is about five inches long, three inches wide.

"Someone should of waited for daddy to come get her, huh?" asks the man holding you.

Your pacifier from earlier is put back in your mouth; you suck on it for comfort. You are carried downstairs, and fed a bottle, and burped.

You are put in a playpen. You lay there and look blankly into space, crying, sucking on your pacifier.
13211.title: You fall, bruise your leg, and sob

132111.content:
A while later, you are carried upstairs. You are laid on the changing table, and changed. You are put down in your crib, sucking on your pacifier.

"Time for the baby to go to bed." says your 'dad'. You don't resist. You are too tired. You fall asleep rather quickly.

The next morning, you are wet. You begin to cry. Only after about a minute, you are lifted out of your crib, and changed. You calm down, and are carried into the kitchen. You drink your bottle, and are burped. You know that escape is impossible. You really don't care...you still wish you had made your bus.

You go about your morning mindlessly playing with toys, normal baby things. Your 'daddy' talks in, and picks you up. He carries you into his lab. He puts you in a chamber. He closes the door, and a light hits. You black out.
When you come to, you are...
132111.title: Bedtime

1321111.content: You wake up, groggy. You sit up. You are at home. But how? Was that all just a dream? You look at your phone. It is 3:21 am. You figure you can get a couple more hours of sleep before you have to get ready for school. You lay back down, and begin to doze off. Your alarm goes off at 5:30. You get up, and shut it off. You are up, and get dressed. At 6:15, you read out the door to walk to your bus stop down the street. You feel you are being followed. You turn around, and are
1321111.title: At home, in your bed

choices: 'Daddy' comes in after hearing you cry
You stop crying and attempt escape
13211111.content:
You feel something hit you hard on your skull, and you fall, unconscious.
You awaken and look up, seeing a white ceiling. Everything seems normal, but then you notice a baby mobile. You then shift your eyes to see a baby monitor, with a red light. It must be on. Not wanting your abductors to know you are awake, you lay completely still. You look at as many details of the room as you can while laying down, but it is a bit difficult. You are unnerved to see an adult sized changing table, and dressers full of onesies and other various baby clothes in your size. This must be some sick, twisted joke, right? You are snapped out of your thoughts when you hear the door open, and a man walks in. He looks vaguely familiar, but you have no clue why. "Good morning, baby. Did you have a good nap?" he asks, smiling. You try to say something, and it is at this point that you realize you have a pacifier in your mouth. You go to spit it out, but you think it over. You may need to look innocent, setting a trap for when you escape. You need to earn their trust so that they leave you alone. You suck on the pacifier a bit, testing it out. It feels weird and childish, but you need to act convincing. "Do you want some breakfast, baby girl?" he asks. You are hungry, but you don't want to eat anything provided by someone who kidnapped you. "Come on." he says, picking you up. You kind of struggle, not trusting him. Then you remember; his trust is exactly what you need to make your escape. You stop and go limp. "Aww, I know you're tired. You can go to sleep in a couple hours." he says, walking into the kitchen. He opens the refrigerator, and takes out a baby bottle full of milk. He heats it up, and brings it over to you. You scowl. He can't be serious, can he? "Ok baby, do you want Daddy to feed you?" he asks. Daddy? No way in hell would this man ever be that. You needed to get out of here as soon as possible. You reach out to take the damn thing and get it over with. You reluctantly drink the milk, which thankfully is real milk and not some crappy formula. You are surprised when the man picks you up and pats your back. You let out and small burp, and he shifts you in his arms. He carries you back into the nursery, and lays you down on the changing table. You start panicking. No way in hell is this man touching you. You start thrashing around, hoping he'll leave you alone. But he doesn't. He just calmly tells you to stop, or you will be in for a world of pain. This terrifies you, and you stop moving. He opens your onesie, opens the diaper, and grabs a baby wipe. You begin crying, embarrassed that you had actually used the diaper, and the fact that this entire situation was real. He puts the pacifier back in your mouth, and you suck on it for comfort. He wipes you, and then applies baby powder. He tapes up a new diaper, this one thicker than the last. Before the man picks you up again, he puts a onesie on you, and thick warm socks on your feet. "Ok, sweet pea, let's put you back in your crib." he says sweetly. He picks you up, and carries you to the crib. He lays you down, and turns on the mobile. He kisses you forehead, and leaves. You cry quietly, not know what will come of this. You need to get out of here.
13211111.title: knocked unconscious

132111111.content:
You cry more, and your pacifier falls out of your mouth. The nursery door opens, and your daddy walks in. "Baby, what's the matter?" he coos. He picks you up, and you struggle against him. "Did daddy scare you earlier? I'm sorry." he adds. Your crying does not stop.
*Daddy's PoV*
I rock my baby girl gently, hoping she will calm down. She continues crying, and it upsets me. I pick up her pacifier out of her crib, and put it in her mouth. She sucks on it, and calms down a bit. I kiss her forehead, and walk over to the rocking chair, sitting down. We rock back and forth, the motion further soothing her. Soon, she is sleeping peacefully. I kiss her forehead again and carry her to her crib, laying her down. I turn on the baby monitor, and leave the nursery, shutting the door.
Hours later, I hear my baby crying over the baby monitor. I go to the nursery and pick her up. I check her diaper, and she needs to be changed. Her eyes are closed, and she may to even be fully awake. I lay her down on the changing table, opening the onesie and diaper. This is the first time she has not only peed since I got her back as a teen baby. I carefully wipe her bum, making sure to get all traces of her waste. I wipe her crotch and between her legs as well, and apply baby cream and powder. I tape up the diaper and get her onesie back on, doing the snaps. I pick her up, and she calms down, clinging to me. I think she is finally regressing mentally.
132111111.title: 'Daddy' comes in after hearing you cry

1321111111.content:
'I am getting out of here as soon as I can. This creep won't keep me here.' The thought of escaping races through my mind. I was getting out of here, no matter what this guy tries to do. He puts me back in the crib, turning on the mobile. "Sleep well, princess." he coos at me. I hate it when he coos. I hate the pet names. It's creepy and sick. I am not a baby, no matter what he wants to believe.
It is very dark out, I know that much. It feels like it's been at least four hours since I was put in the crib for the night. I look at the baby monitor, noting that it is on. I carefully switch it off. I don't need it picking up on my movements. I get out of the crib, walking silently to the nursery door. I open it and slip through, creeping down the hall. I look down, realizing I am wearing a onesie, diaper, and booties. I at least need to find some proper clothes. I decide that loose clothes will have to do for now as I pull on a man's t shirt and drawstring pants. I move to the front door and put on shoes that are a bit big, but I don't care about that right now. I make sure that the alarm is not on, and then walk out the front door. I run as fast as I can, and freedom feels so good. I realize that I am fa enough from the guy's house, so I stop and rest under a large oak tree, feeling the cool breeze on my face. It is relaxing, and I fall asleep.
When I wake up, I note a white ceiling over my head. I have no recollection of last night, and my head hurts. I try to put my hand on it, but I cannot move. I look around and am horrified to see that I am in the all too familiar nursery. 'Crap, how? I got away, didn't I?' The door opens, and my abductor walks in. 'No!' He smirks, and picks me up. I begin to sob, and he pats my back, shushing me. "Baby almost got away, didn't she? It's ok, Daddy got you right back. I think you know that you can't move right now. Wouldn't want you getting away again, now would we?" he taunts. 'There he goes with the cooing and baby talk again.' He stop patting my back, and makes a harsh comment. "I think it's time baby learned why we don't leave Daddy." he says, waling over to the rocking chair. He throws my limp form over his lap, and begins to smack my bottom. He spanks me about thirty times before I am sobbing again. He cradles me in his arms and hums softly, immediately sorry. "There there, Daddy didn't mean to hurt you. Daddy only wanted to let his baby girl know why she can't leave. Let's go get my little baby a bottle." he coos, carrying me into the kitchen. He prepares a bottle, and heats it up. He rubs my back more, hoping I will calm down. I do, but I will not cooperate for him. "Ok, baby, open up for your bottle." he says softly. I clamp my mouth shut. "Open up for Daddy." he encourages. I do nothing of the sort. That is until he ups the ante. "If baby doesn't open for her bottle right now, Daddy will have no choice but to spank again." he says sternly. Terrified, I open my mouth. He puts the nipple of the bottle in, and I suck nervously. He smiles, and looks at me with the affection of a parent for their baby. "That's my good girl." he states proudly. My eyes tear up, and he wipes them away. After I finish my bottle, he raises me to his shoulder and burps me. This is when he brings up an embarrassing point. "Looks like baby wet her diaper. That's just what Daddy expected." he says, carrying me to the changing table. He lays me down, and I close my eyes, not wanting to look at him. Once he finishes this task, he picks me up. I am now only dressed in a diaper. He places me on a large blanket on the floor, and puts me on it, swaddling me. He puts a thin, warm baby hat on my head, and puts me in the crib. He had made me look like a newborn. Does he seriously think this is ok?
1321111111.title: Kim's PoV

1321111112.content:
I put my baby back in her crib, letting her sleep.
*Kim's PoV*
I wake up, feeling groggy. I look around, and see my abductor standing over me, smiling. I scowl. "Morning baby." he coos. He picks me up. I begin screaming. "Aww, is someone ready for a bottle?" he asks. No, I'm ready to get out of here. I begin wailing on him, punching him as hard as I can. He shifts me in his arms, pinning my arms to my sides. I kick, and he holds my legs down as well. He walks over to the couch, and sits. He puts me on his lap, and spanks me. It hurts, and comes as a complete shock. I begin to cry, wanting this to be over. He stops, and picks me up, cradling me. "Are you going to behave for daddy?" he asks. I nod, tears soaking my face. He kisses my forehead, and carries me into the kitchen. He pulls out a bottle from the fridge, and heats it up. He moves it toward my mouth. I open up, and take the bottle, not wanting to get punished again. The doorbell rings. He puts me in my playpen, and takes my bottle, putting it on the coffee table. He goes to answer the door. He walks back into the living room with
1321111112.title: Put back in the crib

13211111122.content:
The man who abducted me walks back into the living room, carrying my younger sister on his hip. Rhea, who is 14, is crying. "Let her go!" I yell. He turns his head to me, and looks angry. "What did baby say?" he asks. I whimper, but I need to stand my ground. "Let Rhea go. She's a kid, she doesn't need some lunatic putting her in diapers and treating her like a baby!" I yell, finding my courage. The man walks over to the playpen, setting Rhea down. He picks me up, and I regret saying anything. My courage has disappeared in a flash. "Does someone need another spanking? I think we need to teach baby a lesson." he says. I begin crying as I am carried to the couch. He spanks me again, harder this time, with more spanks delivered. Once he is done, I am bawling. He picks me up, and carries me to the nursery. He puts me down in the crib, and looks me straight in the eyes. "Daddy is going to do whatever he needs to do to make sure his babies behave." he says in a low voice. I whimper. He sticks a pacifier in my mouth, clipping it to my onesie. "Now go to sleep." he says, turning on the mobile. I suck my pacifier furiously, and he smirks. He leaves the room, and I cry.
*Rhea's PoV*
I was terrified. I had no idea what was going on, and I had just watched my sister get manhandled. Our abductor walks back in, and I cry harder. He picks me up, and shushes me. "Daddy's going to make you feel better." he says softly, as if I were an actual baby. I begin struggling, wanting to get out of here. "Baby girl, be good, or Daddy's going to have to punish you." he warns. I stop, and continue to cry. He carries me into the kitchen, and makes me a bottle. He heats it to a warm temperature, and sits down. He moves it to my mouth, and I clamp shut. He pinches my nose, rendering me unable to breathe. Before I feel like I'll pass out, I open my mouth, and he sticks the bottle in. I drink it uncomfortably, just wanting this nightmare to end. I'll run when he least expects it. I finish the bottle miserably, and he takes it from me. He raises me to his shoulder, and pats my back. I let out a loud belch, and he puts me on his hip. "Let's get baby all diapered up, and then she can go down for sleepy bye." he coos. He carries me into a nursery, and lays me down on a changing table. He takes off my pants, and I begin kicking. He gives me a warning look, and I stop. I feel like crying. As I am about to cry, he puts a pink pacifier in my mouth. I suck on it for comfort, and close my eyes so I can't see him anymore. I feel him remove my underwear, and I get cold suddenly. He removes my shirt and bra, and begins diapering me. Before I know it, he is securing a diaper around my waist, and zipping me into warm footie pajamas. The only problem is, the zipper is on the back. "There we go. Now I think somebody is ready for a nice long nap." he says, as he carries me to a second crib. It is on the other side of the room as Kim's, probably so we won't come up with a plan. He turns on a mobile above my head, and turns on a baby monitor. "If baby needs anything, Daddy can hear you and your trouble-making sister. Be good, now." he says, as he leaves, turning off the light, shutting the door. I cry softly, wishing this had never happened.
13211111122.title: My younger sister

choices: Starting to develop an emotional bond
132111111221.content: I wake up and look around. Rhea begins crying in her sleep, probably due to a nightmare. I want to comfort her, but I don't want to get punished for being out of the crib. I can't take another spanking. I lay there, listening to my sister cry, wanting so desperately to comfort her. The door opens, and who walks in but our ' oh-so caring daddy'. He goes over to Rhea's crib, about to pick her up. I need to distract him. He can push me around all he wants, but he'd better keep his hands off my little sister. I begin kicking the crib, willing myself to cry in a pitiable manner. It works, and he walks over to my crib. "What's the matter? Did baby have a bad dream?" he coos. I scowl internally, but keep up the performance. He picks me up, and I do everything I can to keep his focus on me. "Let's go make you a bottle, and then Daddy will put you back down." he assures me, carrying me out of the nursery, into the kitchen. Once there, he makes a bottle. He carries me into the nursery, sitting down in the rocking chair. He moves the bottle to my mouth, and I latch on. I slowly drink the formula, being rocked and soothed. After I finish my bottle, I am burped. He carries me to the changing table, checking to see if I need to be changed. I do, and that is quickly taken care of. I don't resist, trying to keep out of trouble. "Goodnight, baby girl." he says, laying me down in my crib. I cry out again. He turns back around, and gives me a pacifier. He goes over to Rhea, seeing that she is fast asleep. I'm just glad she's better. I fall back asleep, thinking about what had just taken place with me and our 'daddy'.
132111111221.title: Kim's PoV

1321111112211.content:
(Second person POV)
You wake up the next morning, hungry and cold. You begin to move in your crib, trying to find a comfortable position to go back to sleep. You begin to whine, not successful in your endeavor. The door opens, and your captor walks in. "What's wrong, baby girl?" he coos, picking you up. You stop whining, a wave of comfort washing over you. "Let's get you changed, and Daddy will get you a bottle." he says, carrying you over to the changing table. He lays you down and changes you. Once you are in a clean diaper, you feel a bit better. "Let's get you a bottle." he tells you, picking you up. You start falling back asleep, but wake yourself up. Once in the kitchen, your daddy makes you a bottle, heating it up. He carries you back into the nursery, and sits in the rocking chair with you on his lap. He holds the bottle near our mouth, and you open. You begin to drink the warm formula. as you near the end of the bottle, your eyelids begin drooping. You try to keep the open, which amuses your daddy. "IT's ok, baby girl, you can go night night." he coos. You finally close your eyes, letting sleep overcome you. You are placed gently back in your crib.
1321111112211.title: Starting to develop an emotional bond

choices: Wake up in a wet diaper
Wake up in your Daddy's arms
1321111112212.content:
My eyes snap open as I scowl. No. I will not become complacent with this man. No matter how long it takes, Rhea and I will get out of here with our dignity in tact. I look around the dark nursery, and climb carefully out of the crib. I walk over to Rhea's crib, and gently shake her shoulder. "Rhea." I whisper. Rhea sits up, rubbing her eyes. "Kim, I'm tired." she whispers back. "I know, but we need to get out of here." I reply. "But I want to go back to sleep." Rhea whines, becoming upset. She starts to squirm around, working herself up. I try to calm her down, but she just continues to fuss. "Shh, do you want that maniac to come in here?" I ask, growing desperate. Suddenly, it is too late, and the door flies open. Our captor stands in the doorway, and glares at me. Rhea begins sobbing hysterically, making grabby hands toward him. He walks over to her crib and picks her up, cooing at her. He rubs her back soothingly and rocks her as she sobs into his chest. I can't believe what I am witnessing. She actually wanted him to hold her. I start out of the room, leaving as quietly and inconspicuously as I can. But all too soon, I feel large hands under my armpits, lifting me and cradling me in the large, strong arms they belong to. I begin to hyperventilate, causing me to cry. I know it is too late to apologize for being up after bedtime, especially since I am a 'baby', and I know I am going to be punished.
After the painful spanking, I am bawling my eyes out. My captor carries me to his room, and lays me down in a large playpen. "Naughty babies have to sleep in Daddy's room so he can keep an eye on them and make sure they don't do anything that will upset Daddy more." he says in a low voice that frightens me. "Daddy doesn't like naughty. Say 'Daddy doesn't like naughty'." he says. I whimper. "Say it baby girl, or you can bet you'll get another spanking." he warns. "Daddy... doesn't... like..." I choke out in a whisper. "This is your last warning, little girl." he growls. "Daddy doesn't... like... naughty." I force myself to say. "Good baby." he coos in a low, growly voice. He puts his hand on my forehead and coos at me. I begin to fuss. "Daddy." I ask. "What's the matter, baby girl?" he asks. "I'm sorry." I say in a juvenile voice. "It's ok, little one." he replies. "Can I sleep in my room?" I ask in the most innocent voice I can manage. "No. You were naughty. You don't get favors for being bad." he responds seriously. "Daaaddyyyyy-" I whine, looking up at him. "No. Now you shush, babies don't talk." he scolds sternly. He picks me up, and I begin fussing again. I fuss as he carries me all the way to the kitchen, where he prepares a bottle. I fuss as I am carried back to Daddy's room, where he sits in a rocking chair. He tsks as he guides the bottle toward my mouth. I clamp shut, unwilling to drink what I know is baby formula instead of milk. Daddy looks down at me with an unfaltering expression, and pinches my nostrils shut. Before I lose consciousness due to lack of oxygen, I submit, and open my mouth. Daddy smirks as he puts the bottle in. I reluctantly drink the baby formula. It soothes me a bit, and that is not all. While feeding me, Daddy hums and shushes me. It is too much, and I soon fall asleep. My bladder that didn't even feel full a few minutes ago empties into the dry diaper, and I whimper. Daddy puts a pacifier in my mouth, and carries me to mine and Rhea's nursery. I can feel everything he does, from undoing the snap crotch onesie to untagging the wet diaper. I try to force myself into a deep sleep as he wipes me clean and applies baby lotion. The sweet smell of baby powder permeates the air as he sprinkles some of the talc on me. After he finally puts on the soft diaper, taping it snuggly onto my frame, he replaces the onesie with a cozy footed sleeper. As he zips the sleeper, he coos at me again. I ball my hands into fists, and he rubs my stomach. I suddenly feel him slip thick mittens over my hands. Shoot. He picks me up and rocks me. I open my eyes a crack to see if he'll put me back in my crib and let me sleep in here, but I see him instead walk back to his room. He kisses my forehead and gently puts me back in the playpen. I close my eyes and fall asleep, hoping I'll have better luck next time.
1321111112212.title: Snap yourself out of it

13211111122121.content:
Upon waking, you realize you've wet yourself at some point in the night. You begin shifting uncomfortably. Daddy walks over to you, and picks you up. "Hey, baby girl. Do you need to be changed?" he asked. He carries you into the nursery, and lays you down on the changing table. He quickly changes you, and redoes your onesie. He picks you back up and puts you in your crib. He then checks on Rhea, who is sleeping soundly. He walks into the kitchen, where he prepares two bottles. While he is gone, you climb out of the crib, and hide underneath it. You hear footsteps as he walks back into the room, and see his feet moving toward you. "Uh oh, where did she go?" he calls. You stay silent. He drops to the floor, and looks under the crib. "There she is." he coos, as he drags you out, picking you up.
What happens next?
13211111122121.title: Wake up in a wet diaper

You wake up after a while. You look around your nursery. Nobody in sight. This is your chance! After all, there really is no time like the present. So, you use the bars of the crib to pull yourself up, so you are standing. You look around, and see the door is closed. You begin to scale the bars, but see the doorknob turn. You quickly drop onto the crib's mattress, and lay back down. One of the man's friends walks in. He sees you.

"The little baby needs to go back to sleep." he says. You scowl at him. "Oh, is someone pouty?" he asks, walking over to your crib, looking down at you.

He shoves the pacifier back in your mouth, which had fallen out during your nap. You begin to kick, mad. He takes this as you being fussy, and determines that you need to be changed.

He picks you up, and carries you to the changing table and lays you down. He checks your diaper, which is clean. He snaps your onesie closed, and puts you back in your crib. He turns on a mobile, and baby monitor. He shuts off the light and closes the door, leaving the room. You have a fit in your crib, giving into exhaustion after a while.

You wake up from a long nap, and find the four men standing next to your crib, talking to each other. You figure they don't see you, and close your eyes. You think that they think you are still asleep. One of them picks you up.

"Oh, is the little baby awake?" he asks. You begin to cry. You hate it here! You were sobbing.

The man holding you takes you over to the changing table, and changes you. You'd wet yourself again! Your sobs continue, but are soon stopped by a bottle being put in your mouth. You begin drinking the formula. You are taken downstairs, and held in the man's lap, as he continues feeding you the bottle. He wipes a few of your tears away. He begins to talk to you.

"You know, even for a little baby, you cry a lot." he says. His friends chuckle. You finish the bottle, and are burped. The men spend the next few hours talking, watching football. You are placed in a playpen, a few baby toys in their with you. You look at the men. Do they seriously expect you to play with these?

You begin to throw a fit, crying. A pacifier is placed in your mouth. You look at your captors with hatred. They all begin to talk to you condescendingly. When you are put to bed that night, you...

You are changed, and put into footies by one of your captors. He puts a pacifier in your mouth, and carries you over to your crib. He lays you down, and covers you with a baby blanket. He looks down at you.

"Somebody has to go to sleep now. You'd better behave." he says.

He turns on the baby monitor and mobile, turns off the light, and leaves, shutting the door behind him. You begin to cry. The pacifier falls from your mouth, and you cry at the top of your lungs.

A few minutes later, your first captor walks in, bottle in hand. He picks you up, and takes you to the rocking chair. All you do is sob. You see out the window that the sun has not set yet. You are fed, and burped. The man rocks back and forth, and puts your pacifier back in your mouth. You look out the window, hopelessly thinking that you will never escape from this, that you will live here the rest of your life. As the man notices you calming down, he continues rocking.

He walks over to put you back in your crib, your head on his shoulder. You face the window, wishing you could go home where you belonged. Your diaper is checked one final time. It is clean. You reach your arms out towards the window, whimpering. You want to go home. Your captor notices how upset you are, and begins to rub your back. You notice his expression has softened. A few tears roll down your cheeks.

Finally, you are practically asleep. You are tucked into your crib. You feel relaxed, and drift off into sleep.

Your 'dad' walks into your nursery, and picks you up. You are carried to the changing table. You are changed, and carried downstairs, where you are fed a bottle. You are much less terrified and upset with these men. You know you are too young to take care of yourself. You haven't even thought of escape since three days ago. You are put in a playpen, and slowly begin playing with the toys. You pick up a...

A little teddy bear catches your eye. You clumsily crawl over, and pick it up. You begin playing with it's ears. Then, you start to suck on it's right ear. Your captors chuckle. You 'daddy' walks over to your playpen.

"Here, sweet-pea. This is meant for that." he says. He puts a pacifier in your mouth. You suck on it. You are laid on your back, and you put your arm tightly around your bear. You start to fall asleep. You are suddenly picked up, and put in your 'daddy's' lap. You start waking up again.

"Ssshh, ssshh, baby, it's ok. You can go to sleep." he says softly. He begins humming, and rocking you. Your eyes start drooping, and you soon fall asleep. You're held in his lap. A few hours later, you wake up, hungry. As you are about to cry, you realize you still have your pacifier in your mouth. You are still being held.

"Hello, sweet girl. Do you want a bottle?" your daddy asks. He carries you into the kitchen. He feeds you a bottle, then burps you. A couple hours later, you are put in your crib for the night. As you are starting to fall asleep, you hear rain. You soon hear thunder and you begin to sob. Your daddy walks into the room. He picks you up.

"Ssshh, ssh, it's ok, sweetie. It's only thunder." he coos. You clutch onto his shirt, and continue crying. He walks around with you, and puts your pacifier in your mouth. He rocks you, and you fall into a peaceful, worry-free slumber. You are put in your crib.

He spends the night and babysits the next night as well
132212111.content:
The next afternoon, which was a Friday, you are sitting happily in your playpen. You are sucking on your pacifier, playing with your teddy bear. You are suddenly picked up by your 'daddy'. He carries you into your nursery, and changes you. He puts you back in your onesie. Then, he carries you back downstairs. He starts to talk to you quietly.

"Daddy's going out on a guy's night with his friends, so your gonna have a babysitter tonight, sweetpea." he says. You continue sucking on your pacifier. After few minutes, the doorbell rings. He goes to answer it. He opens the door, and you are immediately filled with terror. You freeze, and stop sucking on your pacifier. It falls from your mouth. You begin sobbing as tears flow down your cheeks. It was your worst enemy from school! He bullied you relentlessly ever since you began freshman year.

"What's wrong, sweet girl?" your 'daddy' asks. You cling to him, terrified.

"I'm sorry, she's usually not like this, Mason." he says.

"That's fine, uncle Jared." replies Mason. Nephew? Did this mean you'd be seeing more of Mason? The thought terrified you. You are handed to Mason. You continue to sob. Your pacifier is put in your mouth, and suck on it. Your 'daddy' kisses you on the forehead, and leaves. You were now alone with Mason! you began to kick. Mason carried you into the living room, and put you in your playpen. You are relieved he put you down. He notices that you have calmed down, and disappears into the kitchen. He comes back a few minutes later, carrying a baby bottle. He walks over to you and picks you up. You struggle as he carries you to the couch. He is way to strong. He puts you in his lap, and begins feed you. You only drink a quarter of the bottle. He burps you. You burp loudly. You also spit up all over his back. He quickly places you in your playpen, and leaves. You hear water running, and can tell he must be showering. You giggle, knowing you had puked on him. It may be suckish, being babysat by someone you hated, but at least he didn't know it was you. He walked back into the living room, wearing his jeans and a hoodie. You guessed he wasn't wearing his shirt anymore, as it had spit up all over it. He sits on the couch, and just watches tv. At 8:10, he carries you up to your nursery. He carries you to the changing table. No way was he going to change you. You begin screaming your head off. He simply puts your pacifier in your mouth. He changes you, much to your attempts to top him. He puts you in a pair of footies, and wraps you in your blankie. He puts you in your crib, and leaves.

"Good morning, sweetie pie. Is someone awake after a long nap?" he coos at you.

"*GASP!* Young lady! Your teacher phones me to come and see her about your failing grades, and when I come to school, I find you standing in the hall, WETTING yourself, like a naughty little CHILD! Well, that DOES it, Baby girl! I see Mommy doesn't need to wait to get home to punish you!"

With that, she grabs your ear and starts carrying you down the hall by it, causing the already amused crowd to roar with laughter. They follow you both through the school, as your mother sits down on a bench, and pulls you across her lap.

"Mommy no-PLEASE!" You yell, struggling to get away, but she has you held fast on her lap.

"You hush, right now, young lady! You know what you've got coming!" she says, as she lifts your skirt. Thankfully, she leaves your soaking wet panties on, "Now Mommy's gonna GIVE you something to scream about!"

And then, the spanking commences, the fact that your bottom is wet with urine amplifies the pain, and you soon begin yelling out in pain, while all around you, the other students laugh their heads off at your predicament. After several spankings, you are crying like a baby, and your butt is burning like fire. After a few more moments, she finally gets up, and pulls you by the arm, still crying, through the school, and out to her car. Once in the car, she orders you to remove your soaking wet panties.

"But MOM!" You say between tears

"HUSH, Young lady! Unless you want another spanking. Your panties are SOAKED, and little girls don't get to be shy! Just be glad I waited until we got to the car. Now do as Mommy says!"

Not wanting another spanking, you pull off your pea-stained panties, and sit there, now naked beneath your skirt, still crying. As she drives through an unfamiliar area, you say.

She immediately turns around and shoves a handkerchief in your mouth, gagging you to silence.

151.content:
You look around, and see you are in a living room full of people. You see your best friend, Maya, talking to your friend, Jillian. They look over and see you.

"Hey, Kim, you made it! Awesome." Maya says.

"I guess I must've passed out or something. I don't remember getting here." you say. You look down at you watch. It's 9:00 pm, on Friday night.

"Yeah, Nick drove you over. I guess you fell asleep on the way." Jillian says.

Oh, yeah, I remember that. "You say." So, you, Maya, and Jillian talk to each other.

"So, where's Nick?" you ask, wondering the whereabouts of your older brother. He was a junior, 17 years old. This was his friend Xander's party.

"I don't know, probably playing basketball outside with a few of the guys. Want a drink?" Jill asks, holding out a plastic cup. It is small, and is filled about halfway.

"Is this beer?" you ask, a bit alarmed.

"Calm down, K. It's good." Maya says. You look at the cup in your friend's hand.

"No, I'd get in so much trouble." you say.

"Oh, come on, Kim. You're in high school." Jill says. A couple other friends join you three. They are all pressuring you to drink the shot.

"No, I'm good." you say. You give into the peer pressure after a couple more minutes. You reluctantly take the shot. Then, your friends drop their cups. You look up to see Nick.

"Kim? You're drinking beer?" he asks.

"Nick, I swear, it's-" you start, as your brother grabs your wrist. He is easily 26 inches taller, and a whole lot stronger. He takes you out to his truck by the wrist. You try fighting your brother the whole way, but it's useless. He opens the passenger side door, and lifts you onto the seat. He buckles you in, and shuts the door. He gets to his side, and gets in.

"Kim, I'm telling mom what happened." he says, as he pulls out of the driveway. "No, please don't tell mom, she'll kill me. It was one shot." you say, crying.

"I'm telling her, Kim." he says. You scream, and sob, pleading with your big brother.

"Fine. I won't tell mom." he says. You burst into thanks.

"If you do something for me." he says.

You look up at him. "What?" you ask, voice shaking.

"You know that sleepover coming up?" he asks. You were having a sleepover at Jill's house the next weekend.

"Yeah." you reply.

"You have to dress like a baby." he says. Your jaw drops.

"Nick, you can't be serious." you say.

"I am." he says. You sigh. Either Nick tells your mom that you had some beer, or dress like a baby at one of your best friend's parties.

You realize it is a pacifier, something you have not used since you were a toddler. The door opens, and in walks Nick. He walks up to you and looks down at you, smiling. "Good morning, baby sis. How was your nap?" he coos. You scowl at him. "Oh, is the baby cranky? Does she want to get out of her crib?" he responds. You feel your eyebrows shift, showing confusion and concern. "Ok, let's get you up so we can get something in your tummy." Nick says, hoisting you up, holding you like you would a small child. He carries you downstairs, into the kitchen. He plops you down in a pastel pink high chair, buckling you in securely. He goes to the fridge, digging out two jars of baby food, and a premade bottle. "Baby, if you don't eat like a good girl, I will spank you." he whispers threateningly. Your eyes widen. He can't be serious, can he? You decide to call his bluff. He wouldn't do that. You continue to defy him. "You asked for it." he replies. Uh oh. He unbuckles the straps and grabs you under the armpits, lifting you out of your chair. *dream*

152.content:
(DO DOO DO DO DOOO)

You are pulled out of your slumber by the all too familiar sounds of the blaring trumpets. Peeling open your eyes, you stare at the bunk above, procrastinating on getting out of bed. Right before falling back asleep, you feel the covers yanked right off of your bunk, causing you to jolt up and hit your head on the mattress stationed above.

“Kim, I don’t mean to alarm you, but you do realize that toilets and mattresses aren’t the same thing, right?”

Once again, Sam was right on cue to make fun of your bed wetting. Although, as much as it hurt to say, it was practically routine at this point. As expected, the ass and crotch areas of your pajamas were damp with wet spots. You hadn’t been able to go a night ever since arriving without pissing the bed. Sam and one of your other cabin mates, Lily, were still hovering over you. Sam was kind of an intimidating girl, with how abrasive she tended to be; especially since she was a good couple inches taller than you (but at least you had a bigger chest). Lily on the other hand was a short lass, who was incredibly sweet. Just about every guy at camp has a thing for her, but she's too innocent to pick up on their subtle flirting. It was a mystery as to how such polar opposites could get along so well.

“How are the sheets holding up?” Lily asked while pulling on the plastic covering.

Lily lent you a pair of plastic sheets for your mattress a few days ago. Good thing too, because the counselors were starting to get fed up with your accidents. You asked Lily why she had them in the first place, and apparently her mom made her pack them (Lily said she stopped having bed wetting problems when she was seven, but her parents still made her come prepared).

“I don’t know about the sheets, but the mattress looks fine.” You tell Lily.

Not wanting to miss breakfast, you climb out of your bunk and grab your carry on bag. Once again you’d have to make the walk of shame to the nurse's cabin to get a change of panties. You waved goodbye to your cabin mates, and took the dirt path heading east. It wasn’t a long trip, but walking in soaked pajamas made it feel ten times worse. Thank god the male section of the camp was divided. You’d die if any of the boys found out. You always ran the risk of Sam blabbing about it, but you threatened that you’d reveal her bra size if she did.

This was the start of you second week at camp. You were taken here immediately after getting kidnapped. Turns out that your parents agreed to putting you in this situation, and were even financially compensated for it. You didn’t mind as it was essentially a break from school, but you still didn’t get why you were here. Most of the other campers were here under similar circumstances. As an 18 year old, you and all the other campers would normally be camp counselors in a this type of environment, but the counselors here were mostly adults. Still, it was no more demeaning than being stuck in a classroom.

Now at the nurse's cabin, you open the door and prepare for the usual spiel.

“Hey, it’s me again.” You announce. You look up and see Nurse Olivia seated at her desk. It appears that she was waiting for you.

She opens her mouth and starts to say something...
