“I don’t’ think my heart can handle any more of ‘your acting’”.

“Alright, well I’d better hit the hay. If I’m going to spend the night in nappies, I’d rather fall asleep while it’s still squishy and warm. Goodnight Kim. Oh, and don’t even think about changing out of yours. I just used the last of the package, and like you said, the spares would take all night to find in a mansion as big as this.”

Maybe almost immediately after the last word left her mouth, Chloe was out cold. After her shenanigans, you too were exhausted. As you drifted to sleep, you wondered what on Earth would happen next in this crazy place with this crazy girl.
152312111112111111.title: Chloe Breaks Character

1523121111121111111.content:
After a night filled with dreams that could never match the bizarreness of the previous day, you awaken to find a conversation unfolding between Chloe and one of the maids.

“I swear; Kim must have some kind of bedwetting curse or something. She stays over for one night, and I’m already peeing myself in my sleep. It’s a good thing she begged me to wear diapers last night.” Chloe casually spoke to the maid who was busy cleaning up your room from the previous day.

“I assume this means the sheets are still clean?” The maid responded.

“Don’t get your hopes up. Kim was leaking like crazy last night. Her sweatpants were soaked and everything. You might have to give her a bulkier brand. Speaking of, look who’s finally awake.” Chloe pointed your way. Honestly, you weren’t too happy to be roped into a conversation like this first thing in the morning. It seems like no matter which “camp” you stay in, a daily discussion involving your bedwetting is unavoidable. Maybe you are actually cursed. Speaking of, you hope the maid can finally answer something that’s lead to a lot of problems.

“By any chance, could you show me where the bathroom is?” With any luck, the maid will help you out. If not, then your predicament is about to get a whole lot…messier.

“I was actually just about to take you there myself for your morning bath. But before I go, I do have a little information to share. Chloe, your father will be home this evening for a company dinner with a bunch of his executives, and he’d be most grateful if you and your friend would join them tonight.”

Chloe though for a second before giving her answer.

“I mean, a dinner like that is bound to have great food. But I don’t feel like having to worry about etiquette and all that stuff…I know! Tell Dad I’ll go to dinner if he promises to let me play baby today.”

You raise an eyebrow. You have no idea what “playing baby” means, but if it fits the immediate description, then today’s going to be another roller coaster.

“Isn’t that what you always do, Chloe? Wouldn’t you rather play young adult?” The maid asks. This seems to be a frequent conversation.

“Nope.” Chloe responded concisely.

To your surprise, Chloe leaned in closely to the maid, and whispered something to her in secret. You didn’t know what is was, but it made you uneasy.
1523121111121111111.title: Chloe's Father is Visiting

choices: Something straight out of a Daycare
15231211111211111111.content:
The walk from Chloe’s room to the bathroom left you more confused than anything else. You went through at least 9 different doorways, climbed and descended numerous stairs, and made a number of left and right turns. This mansion made other mansions look like shoeboxes.

By the time the three of you arrived, your legs felt like rubber.

“Jesus Chloe, if my bathroom was this far away, I’d probably end up pissing myself just to save time.”

Chloe looked at you with a sly grin.
“Told ya, Kim. The bathroom’s a pain in the ass to get to. And you probably thought I was lazy or something.”

“Well, before you start think I’ll of our estate,” the maid interrupted, “there are plenty of other bathrooms nearby Chloe’s room. This just happens to be her own personal restroom.”

You weren’t too keen on entering a room ‘custom built’ for Chloe, but you also weren’t too keen on messing yourself.

The three of you entered the room, and it was…
15231211111211111111.title: Trip to the Bathroom

152312111112111111111.content:
The inside of Chloe’s bathroom was insane.

The place was coated in soft blue lighting, with an overhead aquarium sealed off by glass. With the water above reflecting a wavy texture all across the room. Even the actual “bathtub” was constructed out of sea stones. The bath took up more than 90% of the room. Beyond the first few steps while passing through the door, the boundary of the water extended all the way from the back wall. Unlike a traditional swimming pool, the left and right side of the pool extended all the way back to their respective walls.

The maid took a few steps forward, before turning back to the two of you.

“The design of this place was 100% Chloe’s idea, but due to her very specific requests, we had to convert our previous aquarium. If she had chosen something simpler, we might’ve managed to build a facility closer to her room.”

By the time you finished gawking at the room, Chloe had already stripped down and jumped into the water. When she rose back to the surface, you could tell that she had chosen to swim in the nude. You were under the assumption that the both of you would be wearing swim suits, but to be fair, this was a bath. But in terms of bathrooms, this seemed to lack a few…necessary facilities.

“Um, excuse me.” You turned to the maid. “Does this room not have a toilet?”

How does the maid respond?
152312111112111111111.title: The bathroom is Stunning

choices: Ignore Chloe and use the Bathroom
1523121111121111111111.content:
“Does this room not have a toilet?” You ask the maid

“Oh no, of course not.” The maid responds. “It may be hard to tell from here, but the back wall doesn’t actually reach down to the bottom of the pool. If you dive underwater, you’ll be able to swim beneath the wall, and into the toilet room.”

"Thank you so much." You exclaim to the maid.

"Geez, it sure is nice to have someone around who's actually concerned with using the toilet for a change. I swear, it feels like I'm babysitting Chloe more often than acting as her maid."

This was the first time you'd seen Chloe's maid drop her professional facade, but you were too preoccupied with the bathroom to actually join the conversation.

Without a hitch, you strip out of your clothes, and climb into the water. For the first time since your arrival, you’d be able to use the toilets. Just as you were told, the underside of the back wall lead into a whole other section of the bathroom. On this side, the water grew gradually more shallow until reaching a number of bathroom stalls. By the time the water was only up to your ankles, Chloe joined you in the toilet room.

“Hey Kim, wait up.”
Chloe hurriedly swam over to you, stopping a few feet away to catch her breath.

Do you wait for Chloe?
1523121111121111111111.title: Yes, The Bathroom has toilets

15231211111211111111111.content:
You wait for Chloe to catch up, but shoot her dagger eyes the entire time.

“There’s no need to get vicious, Kim.” Chloe said whilst brushing off your annoyed expression. “We don’t have much time left, so there’s one last thing about this room I need to show you.”

Sprinting ahead, Chloe ran to the center of the room, and approached what appeared to be a control panel stationed just in front of the bathroom stalls.

“Check it out Kim, with just a few key strokes, I’m able to completely customize the layout of this room. For example, I could swap out these bathroom stalls for a top to bottom snack bar.”

Just as she declared, the wall moved to the left like a conveyer belt, talking your much desired toilets with it.

“What do ya think Kim? Pretty neat, right.”

Very annoyed at Chloe’s shenanigans, you left the “bathtub and approached the control panel.

“Alright Chloe, that’s enough. Please change it back to the bathroom stalls.”

“Come on Kim, wouldn’t you rather have some grub?”

“CHLOE, I need to use the bathroom! Snack bars do not make good bathrooms!”

“Don’t be such a prude, Kim. Nobody will judge you for peeing in the tub. I’ve already gone twice.”

“I don’t need to go #1 you dumbass; I need to take a shit. And unless you want me using the floor, I’d very much appreciate having the TOILETS returned to the TOILET ROOM!”

“Chill out, Kim. If you want the bathroom so bad, then feel free to use the control panel.”

Practically stomping out of the water, you approach the panel while scowling at Chloe. Upon closer inspection, the actually mechanics of the control panel were daunting. There were no symbols, labels, or anything to distinguish the keypad.

“What am I suppose to type?” You ask Chloe.

“Figure it out.” She responded, with a grin on her face.

With a bit of hesitation, you press the #4 key, and while the wall remains unchanged, you notice the pool water drain completely. The #7 key actually manages to restore the water, but the #2 and #3 keys once again yield no results for the wall; only adding bubbles to the bath water and raising the the heat up to the standards of a hot tub.

“The single digit numbers only affect the water.” Chloe hinted, before climbing into the hot tub you accidentally created.

As Chloe enjoyed her relaxing swim, you ran through every possible combination.

#17 replaced the snack bar with a juke box.
#19 added a giant TV along with bean bag chairs.
#22 revealed a number of typical bath toys most would assume belonged to a young child. Before you changed entered in the next series of digits, Chloe had managed to snag an alligator toy and mini water gun. She sprayed you from afar as you continued to enter in possible combinations. You unfortunately didn’t have the time to walk over and slap her in the face.

By #31, you already could feel discomfort in your stomach. You needed to go very badly.

#34 brought a rack of swim suits. At this point, you were already fairly dry despite Chloe’s water gun, so you decided to throw on a white t-shirt and shorts. Chloe was rambling some nonsense about how “your boobs were too big to pull off the tomboy look, and that you should’ve grabbed a bikini”, but you ignored her.

By now, you had gone through #1-43 and there was nothing close to a bathroom. This time without even pressing a button, the wall on the left side of the room opened up, revealing the maid.

“Alright kiddo,” the maid said to Chloe, “as you requested, it’s officially time to start playing baby.”

Obviously excited, Chloe ran out of the bath and greeted the maid right by her side. You expected the two of them to leave, but them both seemed to fix their attention on you.

Taking this opportunity, you attempted to pry information from the maid.

“Before you both leave, could one of you please change the wall back to the bathroom stalls. I’ve been at this for almost 20 minutes.”

The maid slowly approached the keyboard, and simply pressed the #0.

“Wait, are you serious???” You exclaimed. “There’s no way I skipped over 0, right!?”

Before you could take the opportunity to use the newly restored toilets, the maid took you by the hand and pulled you back towards the doorway.

“Wait, hold on. I still need to actually USE the bathroom”

You tried to pull away from the maid, but she was strong despite her slim figure.”

“Sorry Kim, that’ll have to wait until baby time is over. I need to get the both of you changed right away.”

“Hold on a second. I though only Chloe was playing baby.”

“Nope, Chloe requested that you partake as well.”

“Yeah Kim,” Chloe butted in, “last night you said you’d have fun with me today if I agreed to sleep in a pull-up.”

“I didn’t know you meant something as drastic as this.” You complained.

“There’s no backing out now, Kim. If you don’t play today, I’ll make the entire staff treat you like a baby for the rest of camp.”

Not taking Chloe’s threat lightly, you allowed the maid to drag you along the series of confusing hallways until reaching a ____ room
15231211111211111111111.title: Wait for Chloe

choices: In front of what looks like royalties, like a princess and a prince.
A Gameshow surround by an audience of thousands
154.title: Another look

15433.content: You are actually located in...
15433.title: Even more choices

choices: Wake up and see Nick and his friend Xander
Wake up and see your mom
155.content:
You look around, and are horrified to discover that you are in your bedroom, refurnished as a nursery! You discover that your bed is now an oversized crib!

"Mom, Nick!" you call out, panicked. Your mom and big brother rush into your room.

"Aww, what's wrong, Kim? You sound scared." Your brother says.

"Why does my room look like a nursery?" you ask.

"Oh, well, this is a punishment for your awful grades. You were getting a 30 in Math, a 34 in Science, and 41s in English and Social Studies. I thought this would be suitable. Also, you will be dressed like a baby as an additional punishment. Nick told me you got drunk at your friend Jessica's party, is that right?" your mom says.

You had drank at Jess' party, but you had no idea your brother would tell your mom.

"Well, Nick, I have to run out. iI should be out for quite a while. You're in charge of the baby, ok?" your mom adds. Nick nods, and gives her a hug.

"Bye bye, Kimmy. Mommy loves you." your mom says, kissing your forehead. Nick picks you up.

"Wave bye-bye to mommy, Kim." Nick says.

You weakly wave at your mom, cheeks pink. Your mom leaves.

Nick carries you into the kitchen, and puts you in a high chair.

"Nick, pleeeasee." you whine.

"Kim, I know it sucks, but this is how mom chose to punish you. I'll try not to treat you like a baby while it's just the two of us here, ok?" Nick says.

"Ok." you say pouting.

Nick takes a couple jars of baby food out.

"Niick." you say, seeing the mush.

"Kim, I'm sorry, but this is what mom says your allowed to eat. But maybe we can just skip this nasty stuff and I'll give you applesauce instead?" Nick replies.

"Ok." you say, surprised your brother gave you the option.

So, Nick spoon feeds you the applesauce, despite your protests. He takes out a baby bottle with milk.

"Nick, no. I'm not gonna drink from a baby bottle." you say sadly.

"Do you want a glass?" he asks.

"Yes." you say.

So, Nick gives you a glass of milk. He takes you out of the high chair after you finish your milk, and you two walk into the living room. You are saddened to see a playpen.

"Mom is serious about this, little sis." Nick tells you.

After a while of hanging out with Nick, he picks you up. You struggle to get out of his grasp, but he's too strong.

"Kim, mom should be home in ten minutes. She said she wanted you napping when she got home, so we gotta get you ready." he says.

You begin to cry. Nick puts you in a pair of footies, and puts a pacifier in your mouth. Tears run down your face. Nick gives you a hug, and puts you in the crib.

"Just try and fall asleep, ok Kim?" he says. He lays you down, and turns on some soft music, and a baby monitor. He turns the light off after shutting the curtains, and leaves the room, door closed. You lay in the crib and cry.
155.title: Hold on, lets get a better look around here.

choices: You fall asleep out of boredom
Climb out of the playpen and sit on the couch to watch something you like
1551.content:
You wake, and see Nick and his friend, Xander, standing over your crib.

"Poor kid. This must suck for her." Xander says.

You look up at the two.

"I mean, I've had a couple drinks before, but mom just told me that I wasn't allowed to drink again till I was 21." Nick says, as he picks you up.

"Nick, put me down." you say.

"Sorry, Kim. Mom's home, I gotta treat you like a baby." Nick replies.

You begin to pout, but are cut short when you realize you are in a wet diaper.

"No!" you cry, upset.

Nick carries you over to the changing table that's in your room.

"Nick, no!" you protest. You plead with your brother not to do this. Your mom comes into the room.

"Ok, Nick, it looks like the baby's cranky. I'll change her this time, why don't you go make her a bottle?" she said.

Nick nods, and he and Xander leave the room.

Your mom lays you on the changing table. You begin to cry, so your mom talks to you soothingly, putting a pacifier in your mouth.

"It's ok, Kim, sweetie. Mommy wants you to be happy, honey." she says. You continue crying.

You are relieved when your mom is done changing you, but not so much when she picks you up, and settles you on her hip. She carries you into the kitchen, where she puts you in the high chair. Nick hands her a bottle, and he goes upstairs to his room with Xander. Your mom feeds you the bottle, then burps you. When she finishes, she puts you in the playpen in the living room.

"Mommy has do to some cleaning, so you can watch tv." she says, turning on some piece of crap baby show.
1551.title: Wake up and see Nick and his friend Xander

15511.content:
You stare blankly at the tv, bored out of your mind. You begin to blank out. Eventually, you fall asleep. You wake a few hours later, and see you are in your crib. Your mom walks into the room with Nick.

"Ok, Nick. I have to go on a trip for a few days. You can handle your sister by yourself, right?" she asks Nick.

"Yes, mom. We'll be fine." Nick replies.

"Ok. See you next week. Bye Kim. Mommy loves you." your mom says, kissing your forehead. Nick picks you up.

You two wave to your mom from the walkway outside of the front door. She pulls out, and Nick carries you back inside.

"Kim, do you want to watch a movie?" Nick asks you.

You nod, and he carries you into the living room. He puts you in the playpen. You begin to complain.

"Kim, I have to do some work, and I don't want to risk you falling off the couch. And your playpen has got to be more comfy than the floor, right?" Nick says. You shrug, and nod. "Do you want to sit up or lay down?" he asks.

"Sit up." you say.

"Ok. Do you want a bottle?" he asks.

"I want a cup." you say.

"You're not big enough for a cup, K." Nick says. You pout.

"Ok." you say.

"Milk, juice, or water?" he asks.

"Water." you say. Nick goes to the kitchen, and gets you a bottle full of cold water.

"Ok, Kim, here you go." he says, giving you your bottle.

He turns on the movie for you. It is Monsters Inc, your favorite movie. Nick leaves the room. You watch the movie intently, drinking your water. You are still embarrassed about the bottle, but you were thirsty, so whatever. As the movie progressed, you finished your water.

"Nick!" you call. Nick walks in.

"Did you finish your bottle, Kim?" he asks. You nod.

"Do you want more water?" he asks. You nod, and your big brother gets you more water.

"Call me if you want anything else, ok Kim?" he says, and you nod, resuming your movie. Nick leaves the room. The movie is going to end soon. You are at the part where Sully has to take Boo back to her door. You start crying. This was the saddest part of the movie! Nick runs in.

"What's wrong, Kim?" he asks, picking you up. You point to the tv, crying into Nick's shoulder.

"Oh, I see. I know this part makes you sad, sis." he says, rubbing your back. He sits on the couch, you on his lap. He gives you a big hug. You stop crying. You finish the last few minutes of the movie. You still have water left. Nick puts you back in your playpen, and you pick up your bottle. You begin to drink from it. Nick laughs. You immediately throw down the water, embarrassed.

"What's so funny?' you pout.

"You're too adorable, Kim." he says, kissing your head. He gives you your bottle, and you finish your water. Nick checks his watch. It is 6:30 pm.

"What do you want for dinner?" he asks.

"Spaghetti." you reply. So, Nick makes some spaghetti and meatballs. He cuts your's up, and feeds you.

"I can eat this myself." you say, taking the fork. You get sauce all over your lips and chin. Nick laughs, and gets a napkin. He wipes off the sauce. When you are both done eating, Nick loads the dish washer. He picks you up, and takes you to the living room. The two of you sit on he couch, and watch The Fosters. You'd recently started watching it together. You loved it. After a couple episodes, Nick picks you up, and carries you to your room. He quickly changes you, and puts some pajamas on you. He is about to put you in your crib.

"Nick, wait." you say. "What, Kim?" he asked.

"Can you hold me for a few minutes?" you ask.

"Sure." Nick says.

So, he carries you to the rocking chair, and holds you. You fall asleep in your big brother's arms.
15511.title: You fall asleep out of boredom

155111.content:
Nick sees you are asleep, so he puts you in your crib. He turns off the light, and leaves the room. You begin to stir.

"Nick?" you mumble. You don't get a reply. You begin to feel sad.

"Nick." you say. You look around your room, and see how dark it is. You climb out of your crib, and walk into the kitchen. You can see Nick in the living room. You walk into the living room.

"Nick?" you say. He turns to look at you.

"Kim, I thought you were asleep. What are you doing out of your room?" he asks.

"I don't want to be treated like a baby anymore." you say.

"Well, this is how mom wanted to punish you. She won't be back for a few days, so I can treat you like normal till then." Nick replies.

"Yes." you say. So, Nick gets you a pair of your normal clothes from your mom's closet. You get dressed, and sit on the couch with Nick.

"What are you watching?" you ask.

"Silence of the Lambs." he replies. You try watching the movie, trying to seem like your not afraid, and it's going ok so far. You weren't really one for scary movies, but you wanted to try watching one to see if you'd ever watch any again. You see something you really don't like, and scream. You cover your face with a pillow. You can't watch anymore. Nick pauses the movie.

"Kim, are you ok?" he asks.

"No." you say, muffled from behind your pillow. You hear Nick get up. You move the pillow from your face, to see where he's going. You see something terrifying on the screen, and cover your face again, screaming. You feel yourself being lifted from behind. You don't want to move the pillow. You are carried into your room. Nick gently moves the pillow from your face.

"Kim, it's ok." he says softly. He hugs you. You wrap your arms around his neck. He lays you down on the changing table, and takes off your pants. He puts a diaper on you.

"Nick, what are you doing?" you ask.

"You peed your pants, Kim. I don't think it would be good for you to be out of diapers." he says. You begin crying. Nick puts you in a pair of footies, and lays you down in your crib.

"Nick, you said I didn't have to be babied until mom gets home." you say.

"I know, but just work with me on this, ok?" Nick says. You begin crying again. Nick puts a pacifier in your mouth. You just let it sit there. You begin to fall asleep. Nick kisses your forehead, and leaves the room.
155111.title: Put in your crib

choices: Wake up in a wet diaper
1552.content:
You wake, and see your mom standing over your crib.

"How is my baby doing?" she asked. You start moving around. Your mom picks you up, and carries you into the kitchen. She feeds you a bottle, and then carries you into the living room.

"Does someone want to play with her toys?" she asks. You are put in the playpen, and instantly kick the sides, aggravated. Your mom takes this as a sign that you need to be changed, and she carries you back to your room. She lays you on the changing table, and unzips your footies. She opens your diaper, and you begin to scream.

"Kimmy, baby, it's ok. Mommy just needs to change your diaper." she says calmly. You don't let up one bit. You'd rather be grounded than treated as a baby! You begin to kick relentlessly. Your mom calls in your older brother, Nick. He walks in.

"Yeah, mom?" he asked.

"Nick, I need you to hold Kim's legs. She won't stop kicking, and I need to change her." she says.

Nick shrugs, and takes your ankles. You begin to sob out of embarrassment. Nick begins to talk to you, while he puts a pacifier in your mouth. Your mom finishes changing you, and lays you in your crib.

"I think someone needs to take another nap." she says quietly to Nick, who nods. "Honey, just go to sleep. Mommy is going to take care of you." your mom says soothingly. She kisses your forehead, and leaves the room. You lay there, sobbing.

Nick walks into the room, carrying a bottle. He picks you up, and carries you to the rocking chair. He sits down, and holds you like a baby.

"Hey, sis, it's ok. I know you don't like this, but mom told me it's only going to be for the next month. It was the last day of school, today, after all. It'll be over before you know it." Nick says, as he feeds yo. You calm down. Nick burps you, and you blush. He puts your pacifier back in your mouth, and lays you in your crib. "See you in a bit, Kim. I love you." he says, as he leaves the room. You hold your arms out for your big brother, wanting him to hold you again.
1552.title: Wake up and see your mom

choices: You and Nick both asleep in the rocking chair
Nick puts you in your crib
15521.content:
You wake up in a wet diaper. You begin to cry, uncomfortable. Nick comes into your room.

"Nick." you cry, as he picks you up. You hug him, crying.

"Ok, Kim, let's get you changed." he says, as he lays you on the changing table. He changes you. Your crying subsides. Nick redressed you in your footies. He picks you up, and carries you into the kitchen. It is dark outside.

"What time is it?" you ask.

"Midnight." Nick says. He takes a bottle out of the cabinet, and fills it with water for you. He gives you the bottle, and burps you. He carries you back into your room, and sits in the rocking chair. He talks gently to you. You lay your head on his shoulder. You fall back asleep.
15521.title: Wake up in a wet diaper

choices: Nick comes to and comforts you
155211.content:
You and Nick both fall asleep. You are comfortable in your brother's arms. You mom walks into the room. She kisses your forehead. She leaves the house, to catch her flight for her business trip. A little while later, you begin to wake up. You look at Nick, who was awake.

"Hey Kim." he says quietly. It is only 1:30 in the morning. You two hear footsteps. Nick silently gets up, and lowers you into your crib. He lays you down, and covers you with a blanket.

"Stay here." he whispers to you. He sneaks out of the room, shutting the door behind him. He comes back a minute later with his metal baseball bat. He stands by your crib. The door slowly opens again, and two men in ski masks walk into the room. They don't notice you, but they notice Nick. One of them swings his fist towards Nick, who narrowly dodges it. The next guy punches him square in the jaw. His partner takes Nicks weapon, and knocks him unconscious.

"Nick!" you scream, sobbing. They now know you're there. They look at you, and walk out. They get in their car, and pull out of the driveway. You sob, knowing your brother is out cold.
155211.title: You and Nick both asleep in the rocking chair

155212.content: Nick sees that you are asleep, and puts you in your crib, and goes to his room.
155212.title: Nick puts you in your crib

1552121.content:
When you wake up the next morning, you are moody. Your mom walks into your nursery, cooing.

"Kim, what's wrong honey?" she asks, picking you up.

"Want Nick." you tell her.

"Nick." your mom calls. Nick walks in.

"Yeah?" he asks.

"Nick." you say.

Nick takes you out of your mom's arms. You hug your brother.

"Uh oh. Someone needs a change." Nick says.

He changes you, and you feel a bit better. You spend most of the morning clinging to Nick.
1552121.title: Wake up moody

15521212.content: You know that your mom and brother have already gone to bed. You sneak into the living room, and see your mom's laptop. You take it into your room. You climb into your crib, and open the laptop. You plug in your headphones, and put on YouTube. You are listening to music, when you see something intriguing in the suggested column. You click on it. It is a video called Redemption bedwetting and consequences. You watch it. You get how the girl feels. You hear your door open, and quickly shut the laptop, hiding it under your blanket. You lay down and pretend to sleep. Your mom walks in. "How did this get in here?" she says, picking up the laptop. "Silly baby." she says, kissing your head. She leaves the room.
15521212.title: Late night

15522.content:
You wake up a few hours later, feeling hot. You begin coughing and sniffling. Your mom comes in.

"Kim, honey, are you getting a fever?" she asked. She gets a thermometer, and takes your temperature. She takes it off, and reads what it says.

"102. Oh, honey.' your mom says. She picks you up, and carries you into the kitchen. She gets a bottle, and fills it with cold water. You begin drinking the water. Nick walks into the kitchen.

"Mom, is Kim ok?" he asks.

"She has a fever." your mom informs him. Nick gives you a hug. You finish drinking your water, and your mom puts more in it. You finish the second bottle, and you are carried into your nursery. She lays you down on the changing table, and quickly changes you. She puts you in a pair of footies, and puts you in your crib.

"Ok, honey. Mommy's gonna get you medicine, then you're gonna take a nap, ok?' she says, as she leaves. She comes back with a small cup of medicine. You take the medicine, and your mom gives you another bottle. You lay down drinking.

You finish your water, and you begin to fall asleep. Your mom puts a pacifier in your mouth, and leaves, putting on a soft soundtrack of Harry Potter, one of your all time favorite movie series.
15522.title: Wake up feeling hot

info.brief_description: You are abducted by the CIA and put in a strange location with a diaper on.
info.description:
Your name is Kim. You're a student at Mahogany high school. You're cute but aren't the kind of girl who'd do something like pose for playboy. You've got long black hair and love doing things like wearing clothes that tick off your mother, messing with boys emotions, and dating men who are much older than you. Yep, you're just a typical high school girl. Enjoy it while it last.

The CIA has been looking for a girl like you to be used in an odd experiment they've been planning. Soon you will be abducted, and put into a strange place with nothing but your looks, your wits, and...a diaper?!?


*Now for the boring stuff*
